itunes:title: Episode 1032 - 11-Time National Sportswriter Of The Year Rick Reilly
title: Episode 1032 - 11-Time National Sportswriter Of The Year Rick Reilly
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Legendary sportswriter Rick Reilly tells stories from his 40 years of covering sports including how (and how often) Donald Trump cheats at golf, the time Mike Tyson accused Reilly of killing his dog, how hardcore Michael Jordan is about betting on golf, ...
itunes:summary:
Legendary sportswriter Rick Reilly tells stories from his 40 years of covering sports including how (and how often) Donald Trump cheats at golf, the time Mike Tyson accused Reilly of killing his dog, how hardcore Michael Jordan is about betting on golf, why he doesn't like Tiger Woods as a person, and meeting O.J. Simpson at the Super Bowl.

 

Buy Rick Reilly's new book, So Help Me Golf: Why We Love the Game
